TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MASResponseInfoErrorBlock(NSDictionary<NSString,NSObject> responseInfo, NSError error);
.class public auto ansi sealed MASResponseInfoErrorBlock extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: NSError object in case any error is encountered during the process.
Docs.summary: A standard (NSDictionary responseInfo, NSError error) block. The response object could potentially be any type of object. It is most often used to return NSString JSON responses from HTTP calls for example.
